title: Bug: Application crashes on startup
body:
## Description

The application crashes immediately after launching on macOS.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Install Claude Code
2. Run `claude` command
3. Application crashes

## Expected Behavior

Application should start normally

## Actual Behavior

Crashes with error: `ENOENT: no such file or directory`

## Environment

- OS: macOS 14.1
- Node: v20.10.0
- Claude Code: 1.0.0
